messages.content: Thank you for the honour of being able to serve as your M.P. for 30 years. Now that I have stood down from Parliament, I am very pleased that Anneliese Dodds is standing for Labour. I know Anneliese well – she cares about our constituency, and she lives here. She has the dedication, integrity, and energy which give me such confidence that if elected she will do a first-rate job both as our voice in Parliament, and in helping local people – on your side. Please use your vote to make sure Anneliese Dodds is elected to serve as our next M.P. I have been so grateful for your support over the years. Anneliese needs it now. Very best wishes, Andrew Smith.

leaflet.personalStatement: I know Anneliese well – she cares about our constituency, and she lives here. She has the dedication, integrity, and energy which give me such confidence that if elected she will do a first-rate job as our voice in Parliament, and in helping local people – on your side.

contactInformation.address: All at Unit A, Bishops Mews, Transport Way, Oxford, OX4 6HD

endorsements.endorsement: Anneliese Dodds needs your vote to serve as the next M.P.
